r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with University of Saskatchewan. The average
  contract duration was 1.13 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $159.7K. The longest
  contract was 8.42 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.5M.
lookup_name: 'UNIVERSITY OF SASKATCHEWAN'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '84'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '15%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '175%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.92'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '4.1M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.13'
s421_mean_contract_value: '159.7K'
s425_max_duration: '8.42'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.5M'
